name: Football Pocket Manager 2018
description:
Play this football manager game, which allows you to start of your career as a football manager in a fun and engaging way. Choose a team from 4 different countries and start from the bottom of Division 4.
Upgrade your players, your stadiums, make transfers and contracts and manage a whole soccer team on your own. So, are you ready for an experience of a lifetime? Get Soccer Pocket Manager today!


Game Features:
[+] Play offline and find out if you have what it takes to lead a team.
[+] Extremely easy-to-play and learn soccer manager simulation.
[+] Go through an extensive tutorial to get a kick-start of how to manage your own team.
[+] Manage your team’s tactics, formation, training sessions, transfers and player contracts.
[+] Keep your eyes on the prize by organizing sponsors, investments, credits and all other financial transactions.
[+] Upgrade your infrastructure and your stadium to make it more enhancive.
[+] Play 4 different leagues and top the tables to be the best.
[+] Try the Title mode and play 3 different cups to unlock more achievements.
[+] Chargeable game and allows you to edit player names and numbers.
[+] Choose from 4 different companies and start your career with your favorite team.
[+] The best thing is that we'll update our game regularly by adding new features, more football leagues and more countries to play with!


So, do you think you are enthusiastic enough to be a legendary football manager? Can you lead an underdog team to the top of the table, and help them create history in the field of football? Download Football Pocket Manager today and find out if you have what it takes to become the best!
